name: Kotmale Milk Vanilla
description: Ready to Drink delicious Kotmale Vanilla Milk is made from 100% Sri Lankan, Fresh Cow's milk & Rich Vanilla flavour. Suitable for Vegetarians. Rs.50 cents from every 1L of fresh milk collected is contributed to a special welfare fund "Sarubima" focused on empowering Farmers children through education. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
